title: COVID: Health experts weigh vaccine efficacy against Omicron subvariant BA 2.75
description: A new Omicron subvariant BA 2.75 is driving a surge in India. Andrea Nakano reports, it has already been found in Bay Area wastewater and may be more contagious than previous variants.
cleaned_text: Omicron subvariant BA 2.75 A new Omicron subvariant BA 2.75 is driving a surge in India. Andrea Nakano reports, it has already been found in Bay Area wastewater and may be more contagious than previous variants.
